title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built TUI (Terminal UI) for interactive chat and model management over Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that streams responses from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (sync/async, Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter).

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC caching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed bindings and an async client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to expose Ollama models in channels/DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM summarization and continuation to your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for niche models.
